```{r}

calendar(
  navigation = TRUE,
  navOpts = navigation_options(
    today_label = "Hoy",
    class = "bttn-stretch bttn-sm bttn-warning",
    color = "#636363", 
    fmt_date = format("MM/YYYY"),
    sep_date = "-"
  )
) %>%
  cal_month_options(
    startDayOfWeek = 7,
    daynames = 
      #c("Dom", "Lun", "Mar", "Mie", "Jue", "Vie", "Sab"),
      c("D", "L", "M", "M", "J", "V", "S"),
    narrowWeekend = TRUE,
    isAlways6Week = F
  ) %>% 
  cal_schedules(
    calendario
    )

```
